title: Norbert Verougstraete
text: Norbert Verougstraete (born 16 December 1934 – 17 February 2016) was a Belgian <a href="cycle%20sport">cyclist</a>. He competed in the <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201956%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20individual%20road%20race">individual</a> and <a href="Cycling%20at%20the%201956%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20team%20road%20race">team road race</a> events at the <a href="1956%20Summer%20Olympics">1956 Summer Olympics</a>.
